author: Mike Hillyard
comment: 18/4 - for some time now fit steps are different to fit app, have tried resync and still not working, any ideas?      Old -Great item having an app from the watch maker but there are some issues to look at please... 1. Please can we have a weather icon, 2. Also a battery tab for phone and watch, this would vastly improve the app and make it more competitive with the others available. Cheers.
title: Google fit issue...

author: Mauri Galvez
comment: Watch face is OK, could use more /better background control,  digit options and hand options. Mostly, several widgets fail to load /display: next appt, battery, compass. Would be my watch face of choice if it worked! Hope it's fixed. Smartwatch 3, w/updates.
title: Most widgets don't work or won't load.

author: Terry. B.
comment: Was Dull & Boring ... March 16 Update Shows Sony's REAL Support of Android Wear! Good New Faces prove you can do it Greatly, too. Keep on showing us you can outdo Anyone in the Android Wear-verse!
title: Sony's  REALLY Upping Their Game ! Finally.

author: jonjon cueto
comment: Installed it and nothing happens. Wont sync properly. Do i need a marshmallow OS for this to work? Definitely not user friendly. Looking for online help is futile...
title: Disappointing

author: tomtalk24
comment: FACES ETC ARE IN THE ANDROID WARE APP!!! Sony could hire some designers and engineers to create some great watch faces with options you want. But you get a few more faces with the same hit and miss additions and backgrounds you had with the other Sony faces. Imo this should offer tens of quality Sony faces each with widgets like steps or date across the range and not just what faces Sony thinks they suit.
title: Not great

author: Tomasz Banasiak
comment: Finally Marshmallow. Just received an update yesterday and everything looks good so far. Don't have to be worried of living phone at home any more. Remote notification work good only "ok google" playing up a bit but that the issue with connection speed. Ability to send what's app messages without phone is plus for me.
title: Not bad but...

author: Kez W
comment: Download the app, no shortcuts are installed and isn't in the app draw, doesn't add any face options on the watch and nothing changes in Android Wear to give options to change as is written in the app instructions. Am I doing something wrong? There seems to be no way to actually access the app.
title: Nothing happens

author: Ashley Emery
comment: Getting better each time. There is a bug with the calendar widget. I have an all day appointment today. Yesterday it correctly said 'Tomorrow' above it. Today it still says 'Tomorrow'. Otherwise very good.
title: Slight bug with calendar widget

author: Trent Vanwinkle
comment: Idk if this is just a problem for me. Or if this is just Android Wear in general... I have downloaded and redownloaded. Restarted both phone and watch several times and no watchfaces on either the mobile app OR the watch. Spent 1 hour doing this for nothing and no website is helping to resolve the problem either. Definitely a stupid bug messing the whole app up.
title: Umm..?

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: These faces have lots of customization and features, like color and widget settings that you can access on both the phone and watch.  They also support card previews, unlike other faces.
title: Great faces

author: Me The Guy
comment: Neither from the phone or the watch or the play store or any icons or anything. Reinstall does nothing to help
title: No way to open it?

author: Hoski Ally
comment: The faces needs to be more customisable, like on the sw2, that was and still brilliant...please add battery indicator and weather..
title: Needs to learn from sw2

author: Sam Rothermel
comment: Bug in Android 6 seems to be peek does not work properly on always-on screen; I change the watch face to one not made by Sony and peek works as it should. Other than that it's nice to have some other choices and the standard customization built-in is a great idea.
title: Some nice watch faces

author: Johnny Morrison-Howe
comment: This didn't come with my watch, but a very pleasant surprise to find, and I'm wishing it did!

author: Hanzo Garushia
comment: Tried it and it did not show up, it didn't  respond to other functions.
title: Not compatible SmartWatch SW2

author: BeeBohBop
comment: Introducing THE EMPERORS NEW WATCH FACES!! I cannot really say I hated this app... because I cannot find it! There is no short cut on my phone. I cannot open it via the Play Store and it is not secret squirreled somewhere on my watch either. :(  I have followed all instructions, uninstalled reinstalled and updated all available software, but to no avail. Aside from the little (useless) green button that joyfully tells me it is installed it doesn't appear to exist! *weeps softly over her boringly standard SW3 watch face*

author: Giorgio Ricciardiello
comment: At first it didn't work, then i notice that the app was available using the  Android wear app

author: Jacob Bondt
comment: Where is the Marshmallow V6 update ,why do you keep lagging behind.If you build it Sony support your products you are a bunch of overpaid nitwits.
title: Sony sw3

author: Edmund Wee
comment: I just upgraded my Oneplus 2 to Android 6.0.1 under oxygen 3.0, I realise i cannot select any of the black backgrounds and some others.  Might be a bug.   Because the first row options are ok. Second row options are not.

author: Levi Smith
comment: It would be nice if you could update this with some newer faces and support. Using this with Xperia X (Android 7.1.1)

author: Herbert Pratama
comment: I really2 like the modern face, but please give us black background option, PLEASE.

author: Sakher Saw
comment: doesn't work, hated my watch because of it :(  There is no option to open the app, just an option to uninstall...

author: Anurag Mishra
comment: I have a Sony smart watch 3 and this app doesn't work the watch is showing the same old system watch skins

author: MNJ Aman
comment: I download it but there is no app on my hp or smartwatch...
title: Stupid

author: Andrzej Szymczak
comment: After instalation there is no shortcut or any app information on my phone. On app store I have only button uninstall. Can not open it. I use Samsung galaxy S7 edge

author: Rehan Zaidi
comment: Can't see the watch faces!!
title: Doesn't work

author: Abba Firaa
comment: It's okay app. I found other apps that has better and more features.

author: Stuart Grigg
comment: Doesn't work at all. No where to be found on phone or watch

author: Mike K
comment: Add more options. This is brutal.
title: Too few options

author: Thomas James Goodenough
comment: Downloaded and synced instantly, simplistic and nice faces 💪
title: Very good

author: Zantiago Pérez
comment: Amazing faces for my smartwatch.. I wonder if u can add the Xperia xz premium new digital clock

author: Zayed Kotayba
comment: Classy and get the job done but I wish if SONY update it with new ones
title: Very Good Watch Faces

author: David Perez
comment: Watchfaces are modern and cool. Tons of customizations without getting too crazy and constant updates. Thanks Sony!
title: Very nice

author: philip robinson
comment: Can't edit the faces any on the watch then tell it to send to phone and nothing happens..?
title: Won't open on phone

author: Luumuno Simatyaba
comment: It helped my watch look cool
title: Good

author: Mir Bo
comment: Steps count is constantly at 0.  Please fix. (Sony Smartwatch 3 updated to Android 6)

author: Jacob Davies
comment: Well it feels that way
title: Customized to your Liking's

author: Grzegorz Chamielec
comment: Why dont you offer more faces?
title: Good but...

author: Beiron Esq
comment: Simple but works. Some widgets on selected faces are terrific.
title: Elegant and essentialist.
